name: Alter Ego Game Archive
summary: Learn about .ERP files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: There is another "Alter Ego" game that was released in 1984 for older computer systems, but this game does not use ERP files.

description: Game file used by Alter Ego, a dark adventure game; stores an archive of game files, which may contain graphics, audio, and other game data; used for loading game content; can be unpacked using the Alter Ego ERP unpacker.
